about_the_game:
Skewer pack contains:
- 1 Rider
- 2 New bikes
- 2 Horns
- 1 Emblem

First Name: Piotr
Last Name: Wackowitz
Surname: Skewer
Quote: The Eye of the Witness is our guide.


Nobody never really worked out what these "witnesses" had actually seen. Or believed they saw… Their leader, White Owl, has wandered the country for thirty years, searching for new followers. Skewer, his most faithful follower, has been seen around and that means trouble.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9.2
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 compatible
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

name: Moto Racer 4 - Skewer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 8.1 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo CPU E6550 at 2.33GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTS 640 Mo
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian
